overview: A teenage boy hones his skills of lucid dreaming in order to spend more time with the girl of his dreams. But he soon realizes that the subconscious can be a powerful thing.
tagline: What would you do, if you could do anything? Patrick hones his skill of lucid dreaming in order to spend more time with the girl of his dreams. But the subconscious can be a powerful thing...
title: Lucidity
